title: Start
question: Questionnaire
instruction:
Thanks for taking the questionnaire. We highly appreciate your feedback!

This questionnaire contains X questions and will take about 5 minutes of your time.

title: Smiley
question: Overall, how satisfied are you with the customer service experience that you recieved from us?

title: Radio vertical
question: During your most recent purchase, how did you contact us?

options.value: In Person,In Person,In Person,In Person,In Person,In Person,In Person,In Person,In Person,In Person,In Person,In Person,In Person,In Person
Quickly identified the problem, What is your preferred way of being contacted through our sales service?
Help you understand the cause and how to solve the problem,What is your preferred way of being contacted through our sales service?
Appear knowledgeable and competent about the subject

title: Sortable
question: What is your preferred way of being contacted through our sales service?
instruction: Rank the options: the most preferred options is on the top of the list.

title: Slider
question: How quickly did you get through to a sales person?
instruction: Select minutes that you were in the line.

title: Text
question: If you were less than totally satisfied, what could have been done to serve you better?

title: Radio horizontal
question: I found suitable information to help me with my query.
instruction: Please rate on a scale from 1 (strongly agree) to 5 (strongly disagree).
